_header: He that loveth his friend and foe
_description: On Christian love — one couplet translating ‘Dileccio proximi malum non operatur’ (Rom. 13.10) in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
He þat louet is frend and fohis loue ne werchet him no
                    wo
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 14.
